name: Dragonbone Greaves
description: Worn on the torso, this item increases your Power skill by +1.

name: Boots of Speed
description: Worn on the feet, these boots increase your hero's movement rate over land.

name: Dead Man's Boots
description: Worn about the neck, this necklace increases the combat speed of all your units by +1.

name: Boots of Levitation
description: When worn, these boots allow you to walk across water.

name: Boots of Polarity
description: Wearing this item renders your units immune to the Hypnotize spell.

name: Sandals of the Saint
description: Worn on the feet, the Sandals of the Saint increase all four primary skills by +2.
